dimension: H.10-13/16 x W.9 x D.4-1/16 in. (overall)
title: Teapot
description: flaring cylindrical vessel on slightly flaring foot with large handle and spout of similar shapes; nearly flat shoulder with short neck and small convex lid; body and neck unglazed with parallel incised vertical lines; spout, handle, foot and shoulder glazed pink with green areas
